name: AECC Global
description: AECC Global is an educational and immigration consultancy with a global footprint, offering holistic guidance for study abroad aspirants in countries like Australia, Canada, UK, Singapore, Italy, Sri Lanka, India, USA and New Zealand.

name: Edwise Foundation
address: Subhashree Complex 6th & 7th floor, New Plaza Rd, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Edwise Foundation, established in 2005, guides students to prestigious universities in the USA, Canada, Australia and the UK. It offers elite test preparation, personalized academic advising, visa assistance and scholarship guidance.

name: Education Tree Global
description: Education Tree Global (ETG) was launched in 2021 by professionals with 15+ years of experience in overseas education. It provides comprehensive support for enrollment and visa processes and aims to create limitless opportunities for individuals pursuing higher education abroad.

name: Education Asia
address: Level 5 Share Market Complex, Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: With nearly two decades of experience, Education Asia provides profile screening, university selection, financial guidance and visa preparation for students. It offers test preparation and helps students study in major destinations.

name: Global Reach Education Consultancy
description: Global Reach is a multinational education consultancy with over 32 years of experience and partnerships with universities across the world. It provides counseling and application services to students seeking education overseas.
classes: PTE and other test prep courses
countries: Ireland and many European and Asian countries

name: Mentor Institute Pvt. Ltd.
description: Mentor Institute has been providing education consultancy services since 2003. It offers counselling, test preparation and visa assistance, helping students choose courses and destinations.

name: Goreto Education Consultancy
description: Goreto is a leading consultancy with more than a decade of service. It provides guidance in selecting universities, visa assistance and test preparation for Nepali students seeking education abroad.

name: CIC Education Hub
description: CIC Education Hub specialises in study‑abroad programs for Canada. It provides study permit counselling, test preparation, visa processing and pre‑departure sessions.

name: Expert Education & Visa Services
address: Level 4, Thapa Complex, Maharajgunj, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Expert Education & Visa Services is a global education and migration consultancy operating in multiple countries. It offers comprehensive services from course selection to visa application and has offices in Nepal.
classes: SAT and other test preparation courses
countries: New Zealand and many other destinations

name: Golden Wattle Education Consultancy
description: Golden Wattle Education Consultancy specialises in studying in Australia, the UK, Canada and the USA. It offers application, visa and accommodation assistance and conducts various test preparation classes.

name: Kangaroo Education Foundation
description: Kangaroo Education Foundation (KEF) is an education consultancy specialising in sending students to New Zealand since 2007. It also provides guidance for the UK, Australia, USA and Canada.

name: Mission USA Education Consultancy
address: Sai Sadan Building, Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Mission USA Education Consultancy has been operating for more than 15 years, recruiting students to the USA, Australia, India and Canada. It provides test preparation and visa support services.

name: Cross Europe Educational Consultancy Pvt. Ltd.
address: Opposite Kumari Restaurant, Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Cross Europe Educational Consultancy provides advice and matches students to colleges and universities overseas. It offers scholarships and visa support and has representation in various European and Asian countries.

name: Gama Education Consultancy
description: Gama Education Consultancy offers course selection, test preparation, application processing and visa assistance. It provides pre‑ and post‑departure support for students.

name: Mars Education Consultancy
description: Mars Education Consultancy provides education counselling, test preparation, documentation, visa assistance and personality development training for students.

name: Avenue Education Consultancy
address: New Baneshwor Chowk, Level 4, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Avenue Education Consultancy offers counselling, test preparation, scholarship guidance, application processing, interview and visa assistance and pre‑departure support. It serves students for many countries.

name: Hima Aus Education Consultancy
address: Madanbhandari Road, Min Bhawan, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Hima Aus Education Consultancy helps students study in Australia, the UK and Canada with step‑by‑step counselling and visa assistance. It also provides training for language proficiency tests.
classes: NAATI and other language proficiency classes

name: Studylane International Pvt. Ltd.
address: Bajra Complex Level 4, New Plaza, Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Studylane International is an approved education consultancy with years of experience helping students achieve their dream of studying abroad. It simplifies the overseas education process and provides personalized support.

name: Nebraska Education Consultancy (NEC)
description: Established in 2001, Nepal Education Consultancy (NEC) is one of the pioneers of study‑abroad counselling in Nepal. It provides comprehensive guidance for studying in destinations such as Australia, USA, UK, Canada and the Netherlands.

name: Alfa Beta Education Consultancy
description: Alfa Beta Education Consultancy has over three decades of expertise and represents more than 500 institutions across 18 countries. It offers counselling, test preparation, application assistance and visa processing.

name: Pyramid Consultancy
description: Pyramid Consultancy is a government‑registered education consultancy recognised for guiding students to institutions overseas. It emphasises transparency, reliability and integrity and represents universities in Australia, Canada, USA, UK, Cyprus and Malta.

name: The Next Education Consultancy
description: The Next Education Consultancy has a long‑standing reputation as one of the most comprehensive study‑abroad consultants in Nepal. It guides students to the best institutions and emphasises excellence, integrity, collaboration, innovation and empowerment.

name: Right and Associates Education Consultancy
address: Level 4, AB Complex, Ramshah Path, Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Right and Associates is a premier education consultancy with a national presence across nine locations in Nepal. It provides comprehensive study‑abroad services and has branches in Kathmandu, Pokhara, Chitwan, Butwal and other cities.
classes: SAT and other test prep programmes

name: Univa Education Consultancy
description: Univa Education Pvt. Ltd., established in 2011, is a reputable consultancy helping students achieve international education goals. With 15+ years of experience, it offers end‑to‑end guidance from career counselling and university selection to visa assistance and pre‑departure support.
classes: GMAT and other test prep courses

name: PEC Global (Preferred EduVisa Consultancy)
address: Opposite Hyatt Hotel Entrance, Boudha, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: PEC Global offers expert advice and study‑abroad services to help students study in top universities in Australia, USA, UK, Canada and more. It provides appointment‑based counselling and personalised guidance.

name: Sajilo Visa Education Consultancy
description: Sajilo Visa Education Consultancy provides a hassle‑free online abroad study service. It offers a mobile app with a visa probability checker and simplifies the application process, allowing students to upload documents via the app.
classes: IELTS and other test preparation via partner academy

name: Study Abroad Education Consultancy
description: Study Abroad Education Consultancy is a leading consultancy based in Gongabu/Bagbazar, Kathmandu. It provides comprehensive support for every aspect of the study‑abroad process, from course counselling and university selection to visa application and post‑arrival support.

name: Niagara Falls Education Consultancy (NFEC)
address: Baneshwor Plaza, New Baneshwor, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: Niagara Falls Education Consultancy is a reputed consultancy providing thorough guidance and support to students pursuing education abroad. It offers personalised services, helps select institutions and locations, and maintains strong agreements with educational institutions worldwide.
classes: PTE and other language test preparation

name: Alphabet Education Consultancy (AEC)
description: Alphabet Education Consultancy Pvt. Ltd. was established in 2019 to provide quality service to students seeking qualifications from overseas. It assists students with inclusive information about study opportunities and has trained counsellors for destinations like Australia, USA, UK, Canada, Japan and Europe.
classes: English language and other test preparation

name: NIEC (National International Educational Consultancy)
address: 4th & 5th Floor, Share Market Complex, Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal
description: NIEC counsels prospective students for higher education in foreign countries and provides necessary information about colleges, universities and visa processing. Its well‑trained counsellors guide students for studying in the USA, UK, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and Canada.
